code: import React from'react';import closeIcon from'./close-icon.png';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';import'./Notifications.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Notifications(){const handleClick=()=>{console.log("Close button has been clicked");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button","aria-label":"Close",onClick:handleClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:closeIcon,alt:"Close icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:getLatestNotification()}})]})]});}export default Notifications;
